frame.name: Businesses
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Proprietor</fen> owns or runs a <fen>Business</fen> which provides a <fen>Product</fen> (which may be goods or services).
<ex>The <fex name="Product">consumer electronics</fex> <fex name="Business"><t>company</t></fex> <fex name="Business_Name">Apple</fex> has exploded with popularity in recent years.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Product
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Product</fen> identifies the product or service provided by the business. <ex>Josh runs a <fex name="Product">copier toner</fex> <t>business</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Proprietor
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Proprietor</fen> is the owner or chief participant in the business. <ex>I worked in <fex name="Pptr">Goldberg's</fex> legal <t>practice</t> .</ex> <ex>I didn't want to go into the <fex name="Pptr">family</fex> <t>business</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Descriptor</fen> indicates other characteristics of the business besides its <fen>Product</fen> and <fen>Proprietor</fen>. <ex>Chris runs a <fex name="Desc">small</fex> <t>company</t> in Idaho.</ex> <ex>I work for a <fex name="Desc">non-profit</fex> arts <t>company</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> in which the business is located. <ex>Chris's <t>business</t> <fex name="Place">in Idaho</fex> is thriving.</ex> <ex><fex name="Place">Local</fex> <t>companies</t> are looking for more and more Spanish-speaking employees.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Business
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Business</fen> identifies the company or establishment. This may be the target itself or the <fen>Business_Name</fen> if it is an appositive not set off with commas (i.e. restrictive): <ex>The electronics <fex name="Busn"><t>firm</t></fex> went bankrupt.</ex> In the appositive case, the name may also be tagged <fen>Business_Name</fen> on a second annotation layer. <ex><gov>1st Layer:</gov> The Japanese electronics <t>firm</t> <fex name="Busn">Sony</fex> is growing rapidly.</ex> <ex><gov>2nd Layer:</gov> The Japanese electronics <t>firm</t> <fex name="BName">Sony</fex> is growing rapidly.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Business_name
FE.definition: <def-root>The name of the <fen>Business</fen> when it appears in an appositive set off by commas (non-restrictive): <ex>My clothing <t>company</t>, <fex name="BName">Togs</fex>, is doing well.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Service_provider
FE.definition: <def-root>When a <fen>Business</fen> is described in terms of the professionals who work to produce the product or service, use <fen>Service_provider</fen>. <ex> John works as an office assistant for a <t>firm</t> <fex name="ServP">of accountants</fex>.</ex></def-root>
